name: auto-registro-de-horas

scripts.login-development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ALLOW_NOTIFICATIONS=true node main.js login
scripts.logout-development: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ALLOW_NOTIFICATIONS=true node main.js logout
